Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You fire two shots at the same target in quick succession. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Aim]{Aim} and then make two Strikes against your mark. Apply the multiple attack penalty normally. If both attacks hit, combine their damage. You add any precision damage only once, to the attack of your choice. Apply the target's resistances and weaknesses only once.
